channel.title: Webclient
channel.description: I was told that if you have a .jar client, which I do, using Smfnew as your website host, that is all you need to make a webclient. I have my .jar client and I was wondering how I would use this for a webclient in Smfnew? I've seen em before.. Anyone help?

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

I was told that if you have a .jar client, which I do, using Smfnew as your website host, that is all you need to make a webclient. I have my .jar client and I was wondering how I would use this for a webclient in Smfnew? I’ve seen em before… Anyone help?
